title: European football clubs average attendance 2013/14
summary: This bar chart has 25 columns on the x axis representing Club Name, and Average attendance in each Club Name on the y axis.
The maximum Average attendance 80295.0 is found at Club Name Boussia Dortmund and the minimum is found at Rangers FC where Average attendance is 42935.0.
The maximum Club Name Boussia Dortmund has got 1.87 times higher Average attendance than the minimum Club Name Rangers FC.
